title: Unable to log in
body: Recently computer restarted due to power reset. I am now unable to log in. It says "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll tri to patch it up to the latest version." Should I just wait for it to patch, because I am not getting a % bar, or do I have to do something to get it to patch?

replies.body: Definitely wait for the patcher to do its thing in case there files that need to be updated!  Give your client a restart as well to make sure it has all the updates it needs.  Is this still an issue or is everything okay now?
